definitions.definition: The feel or shape of a surface or substance; the smoothness, roughness, softness, etc. of something.
definitions.example: The beans had a grainy, gritty texture in her mouth.

definitions.definition: The quality given to a work of art by the composition and interaction of its parts.
definitions.example: The piece of music had a mainly homophonic texture.

definitions.definition: An image applied to a polygon to create the appearance of a surface.
The act or art of weaving.
Something woven; a woven fabric; a web.
To create or apply a texture
definitions.example: Drag the trowel through the plaster to texture the wall.
